content: in this legal case the pärnu county court ruled that the defendant is responsible for paying procedural costs the court decision was made in favor of the claimant who requested the division of joint property and correction of the land register the defendant allegedly acted contrary to good faith by not cooperating in the division of joint property the court informed the claimant of a change in the courts composition and set a deadline for the claimant to submit a final claim the court also ordered the defendant to comply with a preliminary injunction and imposed a penalty for noncompliance the court judgment requires the defendant to pay compensation to the claimant and fulfill certain obligations related to loan agreements the court attempted to deliver the claim materials to the defendant personally but if unable to do so they will publish a statement of the claim in a public publication the defendant submitted a written response but the court deemed the plaintiffs allegations to be accepted a default judgment was rendered by the court which is immediately enforceable the judgment was signed digitally by the judge
